post.body: You are welcome.
I am jealous of your arm pain!!
This is your first tweet in over five years that I've understood without asking.
lol. Dude, you are plowing through them!
has been to Bethlehem, and turned around back home cuz the pizza place wasn't open yet.
just put Christmas decorations up on his website. http://www.maybe-someday.com
Bettie Page has died... Shit. :(
absolutely hates what Apple Aperture and iPhoto '08 has done to my photo collection.
is working on a PC for the first time in months of only using Macs, and it feels weird.
"Everywhere I look you're all I see. Just a fading fucking reminder of who I used to be."
is going on a road trip lunch, and on the way back going to buy $80 of porno mags.
is helping his mother play DVDs on the her new TV over AIM.
just got stopped by the border patrol. Clearly I'm smuggling Mexicans. Sigh.
has had enough. goodnight.
is trying his best despite how it may seem.
wants to do stuff.
is starting to rather like nights home alone.
approves of his fortune. http://snipurl.com/7r000
is rockin' the ginormous Red Bull can today.
is kinda freaking out about how weird this all is!
Well, it was only a matter of time before Boston Legal made me cry.
will someday perfect the science driving with eyes closed.
is discussing life, the universe, and everything with Emily.
just can't wait to be king.
has everyone fooled.
is overwhelmed. Christmas is stupid. *kicks it*
still believes in Panty Claus.
just got Dark Knight on DVD from his Secret Santa at work and doesn't know who to thank!
is building a wall in the art department... to keep the ruffians out.
sings: What's this? What's this? There's wet stuff in the air!
is too lazy to set his alarm clock and hopes his phone will wake him up in the morning.
hates Will Ferrell with a passion that burns as bright as a thousand suns.
had lots of wine and watched The Crow for the first time tonight... I am behind the times.
Pauley Perrette is my perfect woman. There. I said it.
is taking a break from the fast paced world of logo design to kick back and relax and wash some dishes.
absolutely loves this weather. Let it rain, let it rain, let it rain.
isn't gonna get any work done today if he keeps watching the Inside The Actor's Studio marathon.
is dinnering and Guitar Heroing with Jasmine.
just got his Christmas cards in the mail... now comes the hard part: actually mailing them out!
Why's everyone in a hurry to grow up? Where's the appeal in that. Take me to Never Never Land.
Chef Mayhem (the Kevin Rose of the online Haunted Mansion community) has only nice things to say about me and my t-shirt!
Winter Break!! I will not work another day until the 5th. You are so jealous.
Making a ton of new Lost bets with Marke and James. Lots of money to be spent and or earned!
Just finished the first Star Trek movie, and it's a wonder any more were ever made. What to watch now... Hmm...
Shit just got serious. Finished the last episode of Cowboy Bebop. Damn good show.
"And remember, I'll always be cheering for you."
Fishing for fancy papers and rubber cement. Typography is for lovers.
There is a dork storm of Lost going on in the Art Department right now...
One of the few things I like about my apartment is the faint sound of the train's horn as it passes by late at night.
is separating church (Twitter) and state (Facebook).
really doesn't want to be alone right now...
is not broke yet!
has made an executive decision not to send out his xmas cards due to OvernightPrints botching the colors too much. Maybe next year, kids!
, desperate for ideas for Christmas presents, ventures into the confusing land of Ikea.
is gonna try like hell to get the last of his shopping done today.
